title: Rising Reality: Bay Area bracing for rising sea levels
description: Special Report: The region must explore this challenge in all its manifestations, from the perils facing SF's crumbling Embarcadero to the potential rebirth of the South Bay’s salt marshes.
twitter_text: Special Report: Exploring challenges as Bay Area braces for rising sea levels.
author: Emma O'Neill, John King, Lucio Villa
p1_title: Rising Reality: Regional response to encroaching tide
p1_description: Special report: The Bay Area needs to plan for these shifting tides now and upend a half-century of priorities that inhibits adventurous decision-making and design.
p1_twitter: A regional response to SF bay’s encroaching waters.
p2_title: Rising Reality: Shoring up the city’s edge
p2_description: Special report: History, the future and politics collide as bay waters and an aged seawall threaten San Francisco’s Embarcadero.
p2_twitter: Shoring up SF’s edge: History, future and politics collide as bay waters, aged seawall threaten Embarcadero.
p3_description: Special Report: Four San Francisco projects — Candlestick Point, Treasure Island, Mission Rock and Pier 70 — will test defenses against a growing bay.
p3_twitter: Defying the tides: Four SF projects will test defenses against a growing bay.
p4_title: Rising Reality: Battle on many fronts
p4_description: Special Report: The Bay Area faces a common threat along its shores, but must meet it with an array of ambitious and creative responses.
p4_twitter: Bay Area must meet threat of sea level rise with an array of ambitious and creative responses.
resources_title: Rising Reality: Bay Area bracing for rising sea levels
resources_description: Special Report: The region must explore this challenge in all its manifestations, from the perils facing SF's crumbling Embarcadero to the potential rebirth of the South Bay’s salt marshes.
